item.title: About Shu-Hsin Chang
item.description: 12 years of experience in SoC industry with several roles involved and wide range of knowledge across AI algorithm, processor/accelerator design, SW+HW co-optimization and system architecture for Android/Linux/AI edge SDK. Researches AI algorithm: classification, segmentation, super resolution, speech, object detection, reinforcement learning, gradient boosting, spiking neuron network AI framework: Tensorflow, TFLite, Android NN, ARM compute library, Keras, Pytorch. Hardware: ARM CPU, Cache, Mali GPU, DSP, AI accelerator/processor, dataflow, systolic, heterogenous computing.
